posts.post_content:
A few raw T206 cards for sale.  Prices are net to me, with PayPal preferred.  Shipping is $4, free for orders greater than $100.

Please PM or email [url]kris.sweckard@sbcglobal.net[/url] to purchase or with any questions.  Thanks!

Lajoie portrait - $1050
Waddell - $500
Turner - sold
Delehanty - $40
Bransfield - sold
Birmingham - sold
I'll take the Turner, email sent.
